name: LABYRINTH OF TOUHOU - GENSOUKYO AND THE HEAVEN-PIERCING TREE
name_original: LABYRINTH OF TOUHOU - GENSOUKYO AND THE HEAVEN-PIERCING TREE
description:
――I can't let it go that Amanomurakumo Sword is gone.――
Solve the mystery of a towering Heaven-Piercing tree in Gensoukyo!
Dungeon RPG "LABYRINTH OF TOUHOU - GENSOUKYO AND THE HEAVEN-PIERCING TREE"
Finally released!Long stories Dungeon RPG with girls of Gensoukyo!
Towering Heaven-Piercing tree suddenly, losing the Amanomurakumo, and more...?
Find out mastermind of the simultaneous outbreaks!
Fight against the powerful enemies after mastering your large party with girls of "Touhou Project"!
Not straightforward strong bosses wait you.
Let's dig in Heaven-Piercing vast dungeon after constructing your best party within over 50 playable characters!

Keyboard Layout:
"Z" Enter
"X" Cancel / Menu
"A" Dungeon Map
"S" Enemy encounter rate up to 200%
"ALT+F4" Quit game directly

You can choose window size/fullscreen via Steam Launcher.
If you can run directly, please choose the below command options.
--full
Launch Fullscreen mode
--window
Launch Window mode
--screen1600
Set window size to 1600x900
--screen960
Set window size to 960x540
Ex)
game --full
Launch Fullscreen mode & 1920x1080px.
game --full --screen1600
Launch Fullscreen mode & 1600x900px.

These will be more usable by updating.
Please wait a moment.
